name: Wave Lounge Chair - Boulce
description: The Wave Lounge Chair features a gently curved seat, fully upholstered in off white boulce with stainless steel feet. Make a sculptural statement with the Wave Lounge Chair. An ideal accent chair for those seeking to incorporate a hint of curved interest into their design scheme. The chair is finished with muted chrome feet a nod to the stainless steel trend. The Wave Lounge Chair has been crafted for lounging. Makers expertly mould the highest quality foam padding to create this sleek, yet comfortable, occasional chair. The unexpected shape pays homage to curved design.
